column1: #Text=Bolin says : " Love you back , big bro .
#Text=If you 're going into the mountains , you should bring Naga .
#Text=Take good care of Bolin for me .
#Text=I 'm sorry things got so messed up between us , but whatever happens today , I want you to know how much I care about you .
#Text=" Asami says : " I care about you , too .
#Text=" Gommu says : " Good fortune and success to you , valiant heroes .
